data.name: Kapow Pets
data.detailed_description:
Kapow Pets! From RavenFist Studios, the developers who brought you Unicorn Tails, comes a whole new animal-based adventure. Play Kapow Pets using physics-based blasts (kapows!) to strategically move your pet through over 50 story levels. You control the strength and direction that your pet moves, then watch the fun as the pet launches and bounces its way to victory!

In Kapow Pets you play a traditional platformer in a whole new way: One kapow at a time! Use your mouse, favorite controller, or touch screen controls (if your device supports them) to choose the direction and energy that you kapow your pets. Then let physics take over, or for the speedy players out there, kapow again in midair for extra precision! Play through story levels, time trial, and challenge levels.

Earn Treats to unlock new pets, power-ups, and skins in the Kapow Pets store. Treats are earned entirely through gameplay. No microtransactions here! EVERYTHING in Kapow Pets is unlocked through gameplay.

Kapow Pets comes with 1 starter pet and 19 unlockable pets all with unique personalities and powers. Find the pet that best fits your personality or has the best skills to get you through challenge after challenge. Play each level as fast as you can in Time Trials. Once you’ve mastered the game, play through the special Challenge Levels.

We plan to add more pets, more skins, more levels, and more everything as the popularity of Kapow Pets grows!



  • 1 starter pet with 19 unlockable pets, each with a unique personality and skill
  • 50+ levels that tell a full story
  • Time Trial mode! Finish levels as fast as you can for bonuses
  • Challenge Levels
  • Unique gameplay with mouse, controller, or touch support

data.short_description: Play Kapow Pets using physics-based blasts to strategically move your pet through a variety of levels full of dangerous traps and hazards. Collect treats and treasure! Unlock new pets and pet skins to complete the ultimate collection of Kapow Pets!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel i3 2.4ghz or Compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5/i7 3ghz or Compatible
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated DX10 Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
